subject: Basketball
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tim Hardaway Jr. scored 23 points before he left late in the game after he was kneed in the head, and No. 4 Michigan beat Kansas State, 71-57, to win the N.I.T. Season Tipoff at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Tim Hardaway Jr. scored 23 points before he left late in the game after he was kneed in the head, and No. 4 Michigan beat Kansas State, 71-57, to win the N.I.T. Season Tipoff at Madison Square Garden.
